Steps to reproduce:

See rendering of italic text at http://www.neowin.net/news/htc-rolling-out-unlocked-android-bootloaders-this-fall .


Actual results:

Text starts with very bad letter spacing. Letter spacing changes during mouse over, and when highlighting text. The changed latter spacing is also not correct.


Expected results:

The text should render correctly on page load. The letter spacing should not change on mouse hover or text selection.
